review_text: Picture of bag says 'Genuine HOOVER Filter Bags. I was sold and shipped a 3-pack of genuine imitation generic bags instead. While they were made in the USA and may be just as good, don't bait and switch products on customers. I purposely choose theses because they were supposed to be real HOOVER bags.
product_name: Hoover 4010001A Type A Vacuum Bags, 3 Bags
